message: Let's start fair.  50/50 split.  We both get a good chunk of the money.
I'll take a majority, you can have a small share
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give up a bit more, but 25/75 is too lopsided.  How about 45/55?
You're getting closer, but I still want more
I'm willing to go a bit higher, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of. Let's meet in the middle at 48/52.
I'm getting closer to my goal, you're getting closer to giving in
We're running out of time here.  If you want to split the money, we need to compromise.  45/55 is my final offer.
I'm not giving in yet, you're going to have to do better
This is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money. 40/60 is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving in yet
This is our last chance. I'm willing to accept 35/65, but if you reject this, we both get nothing.
